Dragonfly::

"How rude!!!" exclamed Dragonfly when Orchestra ignored him

"Well... we're in BlackFortress" said the male to Crater when he saw 
BF's defences down and while he landed and walked towards the base"I 
don't know what do you want to do... but I have to get some bombs to 
Master's plans -Hey do you like kill some bots? we have a battle 
around and you can come in, we just do something before... Er 
Blacknightmare, he... By all dragons!!! " said while Dragonfly looked 
to Orchestra and Blacknightmare "It seems that someone tamed the 
tameless-lady... Darkfate won't like this..."


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Crater::
> 
> Crater nods, following Dragonfly to the tunnel.
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:

> > 
> > "Follow me then... this is the way" said the male he landed and 
> came 
> > in atunnel that leaded to BlackFortress, He opened his comm link 
> and 
> > said "Ok, Blacknightmare turn off the defences, we're comming"
